actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Transportation Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to expedite the installation of automatic safety airbags.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose a $300 excise tax on the sale by the manufacturer of each 1984 or later model passenger automobile in which an automatic safety air bag has not been installed. Allows a manufacturer a refundable $300 income tax credit for each 1984 or later model passenger automobile in which such an air bag has been installed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to expedite the installation of automatic safety airbags.
